category.description: The category of the listing (e.g., Real Estate).

location.description: The geographical location of the property (e.g., Downtown NY).

photos.description: Array of photo objects showcasing the property.

thumb.description: Optional URL for the media thumbnail.

type.description: Type of the photo (e.g., image, video, thumbnail, etc.).

property.description: Details of the property being advertised.

bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms in the property.

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the property.

propertyType.description: Type of the property (e.g., Apartment, House).

squareFeet.description: Total area of the property in square feet.

yearBuilt.description: The year the property was constructed.

title.description: The title of the property listing.
